SELECT GOODS_ID AS goodsId, GOODS_NUMBER AS goodsNumber, GOODS_NAME AS goodsName, GOODS_PRICE AS goodsPrice, GOODS_DESCRIPT AS goodsDescript, GOODS_IMAGENAME AS goodsImagename, GOODS_BUY_NUM AS goodsBuyNum, GOODS_VIEW_NUM AS goodsViewNum, GOODS_QUERY AS goodsQuery, GOODS_REVIEWS AS goodsReviews, GOODS_FAVORITES AS goodsFavorites, GOODS_SAVE_INFO AS goodsSaveInfo, g.STATUS, CREATE_TIME AS createTime FROM tb_goods g LEFT JOIN tb_goods_classify c ON g.CLASSIFY_ID = c.CLASSIFY_ID
and g.STATUS = #{status}
and g.GOODS_NAME LIKE '%' #{search} '%' or g.GOODS_DESCRIPT LIKE '%' #{search} '%' or g.GOODS_NUMBER LIKE '%' #{search} '%' or c.CLASSIFY_NAME LIKE '%' #{search} '%'
AND CREATE_TIME >= #{beginCreateTime}
AND CREATE_TIME <= #{endCreateTime}
ORDER BY GOODS_PRICE DESC
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
ORDER BY GOODS_BUY_NUM DESC
ORDER BY GOODS_REVIEWS DESC
ORDER BY GOODS_QUERY DESC
ORDER BY GOODS_REVIEWS DESC
ORDER BY GOODS_FAVORITES DESC
ORDER BY CLASSIFY_ID DESC
LIMIT #{count}

and g.STATUS = #{queryGoods.status}

ORDER BY GOODS_PRICE DESC

ORDER BY GOODS_REVIEWS DESC
ORDER BY GOODS_FAVORITES DESC

SELECT GOODS_ID AS goodsId, GOODS_NUMBER AS goodsNumber, GOODS_NAME AS goodsName, GOODS_PRICE AS goodsPrice, GOODS_DESCRIPT AS goodsDescript, GOODS_CONTEXT AS goodsContext, GOODS_IMAGENAME AS goodsImagename, GOODS_BUY_NUM AS goodsBuyNum, GOODS_VIEW_NUM AS goodsViewNum, GOODS_SAVE_INFO AS goodsSaveInfo, GOODS_QUERY AS goodsQuery, GOODS_REVIEWS AS goodsReviews, GOODS_FAVORITES AS goodsFavorites, g.CLASSIFY_ID AS classifyId, STATUS, CREATE_TIME AS createTime, CREATE_BY AS createBy, UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime, UPDATE_BY AS updateBy, c.CLASSIFY_NAME AS classifyName FROM tb_goods g LEFT JOIN tb_goods_classify c ON c.CLASSIFY_ID = g.CLASSIFY_ID WHERE g.STATUS = ${1} AND GOODS_ID = #{goodsId}
